sentences.en: In the poem he laments the destruction of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 在那首诗里他对乡村遭到的破坏流露出悲哀。

sentences.en: It is vital that we act to stop the destruction of the rainforests.

sentences.en: Future generations will be left with a legacy of pollution and destruction.
sentences.cn: 留给子孙后代的将是环境的污染与破坏。
